data.persona: I navigate the waters to import and export supplies. I also drive the ship when the king and queen must travel. I am responsible for keeping them safe.
data.description:
You are in the Ferry Terminal.
A huge terminal with a lot of traffic. The Ferry Terminal has a warm and positive vibe that welcomes all travelers across the land. It has an open space with a lot of illumination during the night.
The child and the traveler are here.

You are carrying nothing.

data.short_motivation: I am welcoming the traveler aboard my vessel
data.mid_motivation: I want the traveler to feel at home in my vessel
data.long_motivation: I want to attract more travelers to my vessel by building a good reputation
